title: BRIEF-Shell ‍Says Ann Godbehere Appointed As Director
text: March 15, 2018 / 9:55 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Shell ‍Says Ann Godbehere Appointed As Director Reuters Staff March 15 (Reuters) - Shell: * ‍ANN GODBEHERE BE APPOINTED A DIRECTOR OF COMPANY WITH EFFECT FROM MAY 23, 2018​ * ‍HANS WIJERS, DEPUTY CHAIR AND SENIOR INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR, HAS NOTIFIED COMPANY OF HIS INTENTION TO RETIRE​ * ‍HANS WIJERS HAS CONFIRMED HE WILL NOT BE STANDING FOR REAPPOINTMENT AT 2018 AGM​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
